alert.note: Alert for Coastal Georgetown; Inland Georgetown (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 1:25PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Georgetown County through 200 PM EST... At 125 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Georgetown, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Georgetown, DeBordieu Colony, Pawleys Island, Murrells Inlet, Plantersville, Graves, Oatland, Litchfield Beach, Georgetown Memorial Hospital and Waccamaw Community Hospital. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
